description.value:
The primordial Ilmeth felt sorrow for the lives he claimed in the Dawn War, and the war-frenzied titans under his command destroyed him for his weakness. You channel the sorrow of the slain primordial to wound your enemy with regret.

Daily âœ¦ Arcane, Implement, Psychic, Teleportation

Standard Action • Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier psychic damage. Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target makes an attack roll against you, it takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Miss: Half damage.

Vestige Pact: You gain access to the vestige of Ilmeth.

Ilmeth Pact Boon: You and an ally within 5 squares of you can swap positions as a free action.

Eyes of the Vestige Augment: Your eyes of the vestige target also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 79.
